segments.text: I see water overflowing from the sink, pooling on the floor beneath it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman seems completely unaware as her attention is solely on the plate she's drying.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's surprising to me that she hasn't noticed the mess around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but worry about the mess and potential damage to the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are up to something I just know it; they're not supposed to be climbing on that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy reaches into the cookie jar, his excitement palpable as he stretches upward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And that girl, standing there with her hand out, looks eager for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It all feels a bit chaotic, yet the garden outside remains calm and inviting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I want to warn them, to stop this madness before someone gets hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But really, this simple scene of a kitchen is turning into a disaster right before my eyes.
segments.speaker: PAR
